sqlMap.select:
SELECT MID ,MER_TYPE ,MER_SYS_ID ,SUB_MER_NAME ,DEBIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA ,DEBIT_CARD_QUOTA ,DEBIT_CARD_COUNT ,CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA ,CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA ,CREDIT_CARD_COUNT ,TERMINAL_CARD_QUOTA ,TRANSFER_PER_CARD_QUOTA ,TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA ,TRANSFER_CARD_COUNT ,TERMINAL_TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA ,PAY_CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA ,PAY_CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA ,PAY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT ,TRANS_TIME_BEGIN ,TRANS_TIME_END ,TRANS_RULES ,QUERY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT ,QUERY_DEBIT_CARD_COUNT ,MER_TRANS_QUOTA FROM MER_RISK WHERE 1=1 AND MER_RISK.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#debit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#debit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#debit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#credit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#credit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#terminal_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#transfer_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#transfer_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#transfer_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#terminal_transfer_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RULES) Like '%'||(#trans_rules:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(QUERY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#query_credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(QUERY_DEBIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#query_debit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TRANS_QUOTA) =#mer_trans_quota#
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_RISK WHERE 1=1 AND MER_RISK.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#debit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#debit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#debit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#credit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#credit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#terminal_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#transfer_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#transfer_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANSFER_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#transfer_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TRANSFER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#terminal_transfer_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#pay_credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RULES) Like '%'||(#trans_rules:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(QUERY_CREDIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#query_credit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(QUERY_DEBIT_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#query_debit_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TRANS_QUOTA) =#mer_trans_quota#
